sections.title: Team PANIC
sections.text: Our team name, PANIC, stands for Pathfinding Automated Network with Induction Charging

sections.title: Cars
sections.text: The cars are cheap remote controlled *insert car name* that we modifed to use as a demonstration.

sections.title: Road
sections.text: The road is (probably going to be) made from triple ply cardboard to keep it strong whilst also being light and portable.

sections.title: Hosting
sections.text: This website is currently hosted on Cloudflare Pages, it is using a custom domain from nic.eu.org.

sections.title: Framework
sections.text: This website is built using React and vanilla css with a tiny bit of tailwindcss. It also uses the MUI which provided prebuilt react components.

sections.title: Hosting
sections.text: The API is hosted on cloudflare workers.

sections.title: Langaugage
sections.text: The API is written in typescript.
